sec.p: Human serum albumin (HSA) and bovine serum albumin (BSA) (purity 99.96%) and antidepressant drugs amitryptiline hydrochloride (AMT), desipramine hydrochloride (DSP) and chlorpromazine hydrochloride (CPZ) (purity 99.88%) were procured from Sigma Aldrich Pvt. Ltd. Bangalore. Glucose and polyethyleneglycol-200 (PEG-200) procured from Sigma Aldrich Pvt. Ltd. Bangalore. All chemicals were employed as purchased and their standard solutions were prepared using Millipore water. All serum albumin solutions were prepared by phosphate buffer solution.
